data_description.crash_max_speed_after: Must slow to this speed or less.
data_description.crash_time_window: Speed drop must occur within this time.
data_description.crash_confirmation_delay: Wait this long before sending alerts (allows 'I'm OK' cancellation).

data_description.sos_hold_duration: How long the SOS button must be held to trigger.

data_description.min_gps_accuracy: Ignore location updates with accuracy worse than this value.
